sentences.english: Digital image steganography does have some drawbacks, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，數碼圖像隱寫術仍然有一定缺點。

sentences.english: I think he lives at No. 23 West Street, but I'm not sure about the number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他住在西大街23號，但是我對號碼不確定。

sentences.english: But he has one problem -- a hot temper.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他有一個問題，那就是脾氣太急燥。

sentences.english: Feel the body relax, feel the tenseness disappear, but do not fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 感覺身體放鬆，感覺繃緊消失，但是不要睡着。

sentences.english: In other words, be tactful, but don’t be afraid to give your honest opinion.
sentences.chinese: 換言之，要機智，但是別怕發表你真實的意見。

sentences.english: But even that makes insecure Pakistanis jumpy.
sentences.chinese: 但是即使那樣也使感覺不安全的巴基斯坦人心驚肉跳。
但是，執行功能具有可分離性。

sentences.english: But as you know, for you own vision is not something that you reason about.
sentences.chinese: 但是，衆所周之，我們對於視覺本不需要推理。

sentences.english: But just 9 percent of those who use M.I.T. OpenCourseWare are educators.
sentences.chinese: 但是隻有9%使用麻省理工開放課程的網友是教育者。

sentences.english: but he left it to him on such terms as destroyed half the value of the bequest .
sentences.chinese: 但是，因爲附有條件，這份遺產便失去了一半價值。

sentences.english: But we dare not press our luck.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們不敢再碰運氣了。

sentences.english: But sooner or later we will return to our emotional set-point.
sentences.chinese: 但是遲早我們會返回到我們的情感點。

sentences.english: But it donot make it any better, what Idid.
sentences.chinese: 但是我做的也好不到哪兒去。

sentences.english: But those justifications have an incontestable value in their own day.
sentences.chinese: 但是這些辯解在當時卻具有必要的意義。

sentences.english: And yet, the writing life continues to capture its victims.
sentences.chinese: 但是，寫作的生活將繼續捕捉愛好它的“落網之魚”。

sentences.english: Edgars says it is beautiful palace - but that “Riga is better”.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加說這是一座美麗的宮殿，但是里加更美麗。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
